title: Secondary Science Subject Remedial Learning Through Virtual Credit Recovery Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Structured to allow adult learners to recover science credits through blended online self-directed learning and offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core secondary science concepts (physics, chemistry, biology) at 80% or higher proficiency via a virtual learning platform.
Learners share scientific problem-solving processes with peers through online discussion boards, engaging in collaborative learning experiences.
Learners complete experimental data analysis and report-writing missions at 100% during weekly offline workshops.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
